name: The Forgotten Temple
description:
The Forgotten Temple is a 2D platformer in which an explorer, John Livingstone, must make his way through a mysterious temple by using the abilities he gains from several mysterious fruits which he finds within the temple.

The types of fruit he finds consist of:

Life Fruit (Red) = Gives John an additional life

Jump Fruit (Blue) = Grants John the ability to double jump

Dash Fruit (Green) = Gives John to perform a short dash forward on the ground or in the air.

The two ability fruits, Jump and Dash, will reset after each level and John will only regain them upon finding another fruit.

The controls of the game are as follows:

Move Left/Right: A and D keys

Jump: Spacebar

Dash: Shift

This game was developed for Weekly Game Jam 50 with the theme Mysterious Fruit.

Known Bugs:

- Life fruit gives two lives rather than one on later levels.

- Sound effects can often be garbled or vary in volume

- Character can get caught on the corner of platforms

If you find any bugs while playing please feel free to let me know.

And last but not least, I hope you enjoy the game.
